data.description:
FIGHT with any weapon you can find against different enemies in the Hex7 Arenas. 
DEFEND yourself with shield and sword and don't forget to RELOAD your guns once in awhile.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39031640_1611492052972544_8434024045580790583_n.png?_nc_cat=111&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=7q-qmfSNcJcQ7kNvgHzRK87&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBZGwpAdIWRtFB5zgx5wkH9c6IeiP1-rdw0RjgYgaxC4Q&oe=6674268C)
SURVIVE the first 7 ROUNDS.
Have FUN customizing your game as much as you like.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/39035393_1502492917145105_2500292279720560247_n.png?_nc_cat=110&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=nkGvaXfpikYQ7kNvgGi4stH&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYDNlqf5tSBLigTgKYd3s-e2wFG_AWPqFMakxs9NQbHecw&oe=6674249F)
EXPLORE the Arenas and enjoy the different game modes.
![{"height":1440,"type":"image","width":2560}](https://scontent.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.5771-25/75392879_331169873202633_892518978300243902_n.png?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=6e7a0a&_nc_ohc=goc4aj0_N74Q7kNvgE-PmX4&_nc_ht=scontent.oculuscdn.com&oh=00_AYBwprZ7JUat_G0hzOb-h9BlFKy0D8_waurrNr76lPWPcg&oe=667409F1)
